bug.author: JohnSmith2007
bug.summary: [Bug] spleeter: error: unrecognized arguments: o- output
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
I just got Spleeter to install correctly without it giving me shit, but when i try to separate something it keeps giving me errors. <denchmark-h:h2>Step to reproduce</denchmark-h>
run python -m spleeter separate -i (C:)\Users\smcco\Music\Power-Rangers_Time_Force_theme.mp3 -p spleeter:5stems o- output
Installed using Conda Run as regular user Got spleeter: error: unrecognized arguments: o- output
<denchmark-h:h2>Output</denchmark-h>
(base) C:\Users\smcco>python -m spleeter separate -i (C:)\Users\smcco\Music\Power-Rangers_Time_Force_theme.mp3 -p spleeter:5stems o- output usage: spleeter [-h] {separate,train,evaluate} ... spleeter: error: unrecognized arguments: o- output <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
OS Windows
Installation type Conda
RAM available 16GB
Hardware spec GPU: nVIDIA GeForce 1050 Ti, Intel UHD Graphics 630, CPU: Intel i5-8300
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>
This program is fickle as shit

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/JohnSmith2007>@JohnSmith2007</denchmark-link>
you just have an error in your command syntax, it's -o output not o- Hope this helps
